snippet.title: Sigh of the Abyss trailer ▪ Kickstarter version
snippet.description:
Sigh of the Abyss is an upcoming dark fantasy visual novel set in a Mediterranean city-state both beautiful and brutal.
Embrace the shadows within to determine the fate of its people.

A Kickstarter campaign to fund voice acting for the game will launch soon!
Follow the KS page: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/rascaldevworks/sigh-of-the-abyss-voice-acting?ref=snbkzo
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2025310/Sigh_of_the_Abyss/
Play the free prologue: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1829640/Sigh_of_the_Abyss_Shadow_Bonds__Prologue/

Sylas is voiced by Whitney Holland
http://www.whitney-holland.com/
Malec is voiced by Griffin Puatu
https://www.instagram.com/griffinpuatu/
Marané is voiced by Savy Des-Etages
https://soundofsavy.com/
Alpheon is voiced by Thomas G Burt
https://www.thomasgburt.com/connect/
The protagonist is voiced by Maisy Kay
https://www.maisykay.com/
Atri is voiced by Emaline Tuck
https://twitter.com/EmalineTuck
Ascanio is voiced by Allen Chan
https://www.whoisallenchan.com/

Music by Edwin Dizer
https://www.edwindizer.co.uk/

Trailer by WhiteCharisma
